title: Michigan Brand, Inc. Recalls Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, February 17, 2015 Michigan Brand, Inc., a Bay City, Mich., establishment is recalling approximately 4,287 pounds of pork sausage products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains hydrolyzed...
